complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Core Infrastructure for SvelteKit and n8n Platform
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the setup of each infrastructure component (Git, Docker with SvelteKit, n8n, PostgreSQL, Redis, CI/CD, monitoring) into detailed steps
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Reduced complexity with Docker Compose instead of Kubernetes; simpler orchestration for single-host deployment

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Minimal FastAPI Backend for Analytics
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the implementation of focused analytics API features (auth, SaaS metrics, complex calculations) as separate subtasks
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Reduced complexity by focusing only on analytics; most CRUD operations handled by n8n workflows

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate the schema design, implementation, and optimization into individual subtasks
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving database design and performance tuning; natural division in design and implementation phases

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the SvelteKit development into UI components, Svelte stores, Tailwind styling, and key feature implementations
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Reduced complexity with SvelteKit's built-in features; simpler state management and better performance than React

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate n8n Workflow Engine as Primary Automation Layer
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the comprehensive n8n integration into workflow templates, CRUD operations, webhook system, and monitoring subtasks
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to n8n handling 80% of operations; simplified deployment with Docker Compose reduces infrastructure overhead

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down each major component (scoring, enrichment, ML integration, API, behavioral tracking, source attribution, workflow customization) into focused subtasks, ensuring clear ownership and incremental delivery.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple complex subsystems (rule-based and ML scoring, enrichment pipelines, API design, behavioral tracking, source attribution, workflow customization), each requiring specialized expertise and integration. The high number of dependencies and technical breadth justifies a high complexity score and a detailed breakdown for manageability.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand each channel integration, campaign management, analytics, and UI component into dedicated subtasks, including cross-channel coordination and user experience design.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Multi-channel integration (email, Slack, SMS), campaign management, analytics, and UI design require careful coordination and testing. The complexity arises from ensuring seamless operation across channels and robust analytics, but it is less intricate than full ML or workflow customization systems.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose into subtasks for data integration, aggregation, metric calculation, visualization, dashboard layout, analytics, performance optimization, workflow configuration, and industry-specific package development.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Building a flexible, real-time dashboard with advanced analytics, workflow configuration, and industry-specific overlays involves significant data processing, visualization, and integration challenges, but is less complex than core algorithmic or workflow engine development.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into subtasks for each CRM platform integration, bidirectional sync, workflow automation, and end-to-end testing, ensuring robust error handling and data consistency.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Integrating with multiple CRM platforms requires careful API design, data mapping, and synchronization logic, but is a well-understood pattern with established best practices, reducing overall complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into subtasks for RBAC, team management, multi-tenancy, tenant-specific configuration, integration, and security testing, ensuring modular and scalable design.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: User and team management features, including RBAC and multi-tenancy, are standard but require careful design for scalability and security. The complexity is moderate due to the need for robust access control and tenant isolation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose into subtasks for predictive scoring, behavioral tracking, source attribution, conversion modeling, ROI tracking, performance analytics, dashboard, security, documentation, and workflow customization, ensuring modularity and extensibility.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task is highly complex due to the integration of ML models, real-time event processing, advanced analytics, flexible workflow customization, and stringent security requirements. It requires a detailed breakdown to manage technical risk and ensure quality.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Tiered N8N Workflow Builder Interface
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for UI design, access control, sandbox environments, version control, resource limits, integration, package management, tiered access, package testing, versioning, and documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Building a tiered workflow builder with package management, sandboxing, version control, and resource limits is complex due to the need for robust access control, isolation, and extensibility, but is less intricate than core ML or analytics engine development.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into subtasks for workflow template design, integration mapping, custom field definition, sample package development, package management, workflow customization, integration configuration, documentation, and testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Developing a modular, industry-agnostic workflow framework with sample packages and robust management features is complex due to the need for flexibility, integration, and extensibility, but is less complex than core algorithmic or analytics engine work.
